text: Conveniently located near our office, this outlet is perfect for lunchtime errands. The staff are always helpful and pleasant, but Ms. Helen ( a senior lady on duty today at around 2-3 pm ) truly stood out. Her kind and empathetic nature shone through as she offered cost-saving bulk purchase advice and ensured I could comfortably carry my items. Her genuine concern was heartwarming and commendable. Thank you, Ms. Helen, for exceptional service!

"This store (Unity Tanglin Mall) is a great destination for all your medical and health supplement needs. The store is well-organized and tidy, making it easy to find what you're looking for. The staff and pharmacists are incredibly helpful and knowledgeable, providing excellent guidance and advice. A truly exceptional shopping experience!"
